items.title: Home First Finance: Gearing up for the next milestone
items.description: Technology, at the heart of strategic initiatives, will drive growth and profitability

items.title: Metro Brands: Looking forward to a strong second half
items.description: Metro Brands Limited is expected to significantly strengthen its presence in the S&A (sports and athleisure) category, with tie-ups/acquisitions. This will provide the next leg of growth.
